name: Broken Legs
description:
Hiya, It's Ruukasu here, the creator of Broken Legs and I'd just like you to know:

This is my first game.                                                                                                                                    

Tweet me @RuukasuDraw what you think. 

And before you ask, yes I am planning to make the game longer and release it again sometime in the future!

Um, that's it. All rights reserved. Blah Blah :)
